body_html:
Exact same problem. But I installed caffe2 long ago and only have pytorch built from source using anaconda just now.
echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH gives
/home/*********/torch/install/lib:/usr/local/lib:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64
Which doesn't have caffe2

body:
Exact same problem. But I installed caffe2 long ago and only have pytorch built from source using anaconda just now.
`echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH` gives
`/home/*********/torch/install/lib:/usr/local/lib:/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64`
Which doesn't have caffe2
